comments:
Build ID: v20070626-0630

Steps To Reproduce:
1. switch to the java perspective and from within 
   a Java project select new->Other->Report
2. create a Simple Listing report (or any other)
3. a dialog will ask if I would like to switch to the
   Report Designer perspective, my answer is NO
4. an error dialog will appear with Reason: "Widget has 
   the wrong parent"
5. see additional information for error-log:
